briefdescription.para: Callback for a raw frame message.
Callbacks which can be used to intercept NHLE messages.
Callbacks which can be used to intercept NHLE messages.

simplesect.para: Called at a low level, so passed frame must be dealt with expediently
true if rx is enabled, false otherwise
Based on the two values: PIB rx on when idle and rx enable flag set through MLME-RX-ENABLE.req. Note PIB rx on when idle is considered a "conflicting responsibility" ([109,10-13])
